text:
Quotes - URL from Product Description not linking on finalised quote
When entering products into the catalogue for quotes, I have been putting in relevant URLs as prompted in HS, hoping the customer can click on the line items for more info.

But the URLs don't seem to show on the published quotes. I've tested the 3 given templates (Basic, Modern and Original) and there's no clickable product links..

What am I missing here..?
I don’t think that those URL’s are pulled into the default templates. Unless you have the addon/upgrade (I forget which one) you cannot customize these templates at all.
